name: Dynal.AI
tagline: Your LinkedIn post studio from sources to impact
description: Turn ideas, links, PDFs, and images into ready-to-post LinkedIn posts in minutes. Dynal learns your tone and uses proven patterns to draft editable copy and visuals, making it easier to post consistently and reach more people.

name: Pinch to Build by Vibecode App
tagline: The most powerful way to build professional mobile apps.
description: Introducing Pinch to Build. A completely new interface for vibe coding professional apps. One that makes building mobile apps feel like using CapCut.

name: Pokee AI
tagline: Vibe Your Agentic Workflows
description: World's first vibe agentic workflow builder with an API that is as easy to use as ChatGPT. All Auth Handled. Agentic workflows now only require a single text prompt. No more manual node wiring. Reproducible. Reliable. Guaranteed.

name: LLM Stats
tagline: Compare API models by benchmarks, cost & capabilities
description: LLM Stats is the go-to place to analyze and compare AI models across benchmarks, pricing and capabilities. Compare model performance easily through our playground and API that gives you access to hundreds of models at once.

name: Grokipedia
tagline: Elon's answer to Wikipedia
description: Grokipedia is xAI's new AI-generated encyclopedia, powered by Grok. Pitched by Elon Musk as a more truthful alternative to Wikipedia, it launched with nearly 900k articles aiming to reshape online knowledge using AI.

name: Fitbit Enterprise
tagline: Personal health coach built with Gemini
description: Fitbit Enterprise offers a range of health and wellness products and services to help you live a healthier life.

name: chaos
tagline: The workspace for music creators
description: The workspace for music creators - engineered to keep your ideas, collaborations, and workflow moving.

name: Trace-AI
tagline: Know What You Ship. Secure What You Depend On.
description: Trace-AI predicts and prevents supply-chain attacks via metadata-driven analysis of open-source dependencies, registries, and maintainer activity, no source code needed. Built by engineers who scaled to millions, it helps teams ship fast and secure.

name: MailerLite email marketing MCP server
tagline: Turn your AI tool into a personal email marketing assistant
description: Interact with your email marketing data using natural language prompts. Connect MailerLite directly to tools like ChatGPT or Claude and ask the AI to perform tasks, analyze campaigns, and so much more!

name: Fibre AI
tagline: Secure file uploads for Intercom, Crisp & Zendesk
description: Secure document collection for Intercom, Crisp and Zendesk. Files upload directly from customers to your own cloud storage - bypassing our servers entirely. Full control over where sensitive documents land, with custom branding and no 100MB limits.

name: Conduit
tagline: Organize & edit local files with AI from your browser
description: AI agent that safely operates on files on your laptop from your browser. No installation. Select a folder - Claude reads, organizes, searches, and edits your files locally. Like bringing Cursor to the browser. Chrome browsers only.

name: Aurely
tagline: Private voice reminders for Mac with no cloud or accounts
description: Aurely lets you create reminders instantly using your voice. No typing, no accounts, no cloud â€” just your Mac. Speak naturally and Aurely understands you in multiple languages. Designed to be calm, offline, and privacy-first.

name: TheSaaSHub
tagline: Curating top 10 shopify apps across all categories
description: Find the best Shopify apps for your store. Browse by category, read reviews, watch demos, and unlock exclusive discounts. Trusted by thousands of merchants worldwide.

name: RankDots
tagline: Discover topics that rank and write content that wins
description: RankDots helps you discover high-potential SEO topics, cluster keywords, and generate AI-powered content thatâ€™s built to rank. No more endless keyword spreadsheets. Just clear, strategic content insights that drive traffic and leads.

name: bitdrift
tagline: Mobile observability & crash reporting, built for apps
description: Get real-time visibility into your mobile app. No waiting for release cycles, no extra wiring, no noise. Define what matters remotely, capture rich on-device logs, and surface the most important sessions for quick debugging. Includes free crash reporting.

name: Vortex, 10X your k-factor for free.
tagline: Turn invitations into your fastest growth channel
description: Vortex is a drop-in tool that productizes invitation flows. Early beta results show up to a 10x lift in invite-to-activation. We have just opened our beta and are offering it nearly free to prove the impact! Book a meeting through vortexsoftware.com

name: NMI Payments
tagline: Launch payments fast with NMI's developer experience.
description: NMIâ€™s new developer experience helps SaaS platforms and software companies embed payments in hours, not weeks! No sales calls, no red tape, just clean APIs and fast go-live.

name: Prizo
tagline: Gamify your Shopify store and keep customers coming back
description: Make your thank-you page fun! ðŸŽ‰ With PRIZO, customers play quick games after checkout, win cool rewards, and come back for more. Easy to set up, fun to use, and built to keep your Shopify customers hooked.

name: Next Mile
tagline: Track your milestones & celebrate in community
description: Are you a product builder? Join NextMile, connect your Stripe or Lemon squeezy store and start winning in public. Create milestones, achieve them & build your audience

name: MeetPanda
tagline: All-in-one AI: smart meetings, chat, and productivity apps
description: AI-powered meetings, chats, and apps in one place. MeetPanda joins, records, and summarizes meetings, giving you instant notes, smart insights, and collaborative AI chat to boost productivity.
